column1: Eating Disorders and Clinical Nutrition MSc
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis MSc is the only graduate programme available in eating disorders. It is intended for professionals wishing to work in the eating disorders field at a high level. The qualification will appeal to clinicians and scientists who wish to provide treatment, develop services, and conduct research in this field. You study full full-time over one year or part-time over two years.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
